Categorize this IT Ticket:

built key logger discovered several hp laptop models us friday pm built key logger discovered several models hi ask has has models included link then work out has affected audio driver installed driver least utility going release updated version driver which push out installation needed affected driver installed kind regards built key logger discovered several models hi quite has brought attention make safe side report made by saying model key logger audio driver affected models include series folio series others these models find affected models other details regards test consultant
